>         
>         "pienso luego existo" implica que en caso de suceder "no

>         Digamos que la situaci�n hasta el punto de "I think not"
>         genera dos chistes diferentes posibles:

>                 1)
>                 Descartes goes into a restaurant and orders a cup of

>                 A little while later, the waitress comes by and asks

>                 not" and disappears.

>                 2)
>                 Descartes goes into a restaurant and orders a cup of

>                 reading the paper. 
>                 A little while later, the waitress comes by and asks
>                 him if he would like another cup. He says "I think
>                 not" and doesn't disappear.
